verbose_text: In addition, our results also showed significant betaIII-tubulin expression following transduction with Lenti-NT-3 alone compared to non targeting control (even without a reduction in NG2 protein), in particular in the IZ, suggesting that the increase in axonal growth, is localised and appeared to be short distance sprouting at the lesion site compared to Lenti-NT-3 / NG2 sh1 transduced slices (XREF_FIG).
